      • addNewTab

        public void addNewTab(MainContentModel UCContentModel,
             MainContentModel UMLContentModel,
             MainContentModel OOPNContentModel,
             java.lang.String name)
        Add new tab to file tab. Create tab for useCase, classDiagram and OOPetriNets. Add these elemnts to close tab and create plus tab panel.
        Parameters:
        UCContentModel - MainContentModel of useCase.
        UMLContentModel - MainContentModel of classDiagram.
        OOPNContentModel - MainContentModel of objected oriented pteri nets.
        name - file tab name.
